titles.title: Deficit Trust Fund Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish the Deficit Trust Fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5819-5820)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Deficit Trust Fund Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish the Deficit Trust Fund to pay the public debt. Appropriates to such Fund the revenues resulting from the Revenue Reconciliation Act of 1993.
